charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1101_010:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] saw a suspicious
character around town... Or so [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] thought, but
it was actually just Ball Guy.
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_020:
Hey there! Thanks for rolling by to have a chat
with your mate—the Ball Guy!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_030:
I’m sure you want me to give you a wonderful
Poké Ball, right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_050:
My bad! Sometimes even the children on Pasio
ask me for them, so I just assumed!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_060: I’m super popular here on Pasio now!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_070:
Well...I’d like to be, anyhow. But right now, I’m
still sort of just recogniza-ball, right?
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_080:
If I stay on the ball, I’ll be so popular that
everyone on Pasio will think I’m adora-ball!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_090:
Then I’ll be on a roll toward finally becoming the
Galar Pokémon League official mascot...
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_110:
Anyhow, as a mascot, I want to be proactive
about cheering people on!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_0401_130: Thanks! And that’s not all I’m good for!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_0402_150: Why? Do you want me to join your team?!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_160:
I have a super dependa-ball partner Pokémon,
so I’m sure I can be of some help!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_170:
Amoonguss and I have been great friends ever
since he was a Foongus! We often practice
dancing together!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_180:
Oh, and just so you know, Amoonguss isn’t a
Poké Ball!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_190:
He sometimes pretends to be a Poké Ball, but he’s
a Pokémon through and through!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_200:
I mean, I could tell he wasn’t actually a Poké Ball
from the first time we met!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_210:
You should be wary of other Pokémon that
pretend to be Poké Balls!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_220:
If you try to grab one thinking it’s a Poké Ball,
it might shock you...or even explode!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_230:
There’s even a Pokémon that lures in prey using its
Poké Ball–colored lips!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_240:
Poké Balls are just full of surprises, don’t
you think?
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_250:
You should really learn about Poké Balls so you’re
not tricked by Pokémon that disguise as them!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_0302_280: Please, teach me about Poké Balls!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_300:
The first thing to do is determine your favorite type
of Poké Ball!
charaepi_ch0282_00_ballguy/2301_1201_310: What kind of Poké Balls do you like?
